DOC.brief_summary: Effect upper respiratory infection ( URI ) diabetic subject meal challenge
DOC.brief_title: Effects URI Diabetic Subjects Utilizing Technosphere Insulin After Meal Challenge
DOC.criteria: Subjects meet inclusion criterion MKCTI030 Clinical diagnosis URI 24 hr prior clinic visit and/or day clinic visit At least 3 URI symptom Prior participation MKCTI112 MedHist , PE lab finding acute bacterial infection include limited sputum prod. , nasal/eye discharge , chest exam abnormality , CXR find pneumonia .
